Moderation und Auswahl: Roland Spiegel "Slinky" (John Scofield) "Country Man" (Larry Goldings) "I want to talk about you" (Billy Eckstine) "Green pajamas" (John Scofield) "Tennessee Waltz" (Pee Wee King/Redd Stewart) http://www.br.de/radio/br-klassik/programmkalender/sendung539106.html John Scofield Trio Burghausen 2013-03-14 mp2

feed.name: John Wheatcroft,Jim Clarke: Professor Wheato's All Stars
feed.summary: Professor Wheato's All Stars rocked The Rocket in Acton. Here's a clip of Jim Clarke giving it large over the John Scofield tune 'Jeep on 35' Professor Wheato's All Stars were: John Wheatcroft: Guitar Richie Garrison: Sax Jim Clarke: Guitar Oscar Stieler: Keys Dave Marks: Bass Erik Stams: Drums Joao Caetano: Percussion' John Wheatcroft tears it up! Freddie freeloader guitar solo Jim Clarke killer guitar Solo: Jeep on 35 John Wheatcroft,Jim Clarke: Professor Wheato's All Stars
